content.text: Hi, my name is participant_1.
Hi, my name is Todd.
What's your favorite kind of comic book?
I like superhero comics.
Me too! I love Batman and Superman.
Me too! I also like Green Lantern and Wonder Woman.
I've heard good things about Green Lantern.
He's a really cool character. He can create anything with his mind.
That's amazing! I'm not very familiar with Wonder Woman.
She's a great superhero. She's super strong and she can fly.
She sounds like a lot of fun!
She is! She's also a great role model for girls.
I'm glad to hear that. I think it's important for girls to have strong female role models.
Me too! I think it's really important to have diverse role models, so that girls can see that they can be anything they want to be.
I agree. I think it's important to show kids that they can be whoever they want to be, regardless of their gender.
I'm glad you think so. I think it's a really important message to send.
It is. I think it's something that we should all keep in mind.
I agree. I think it's important to be positive and supportive of everyone.
I agree. I think it's important to be kind and respectful of everyone, regardless of their differences.
I agree. I think it's important to treat everyone with the same respect that we want to be treated with.
I agree. I think it's important to be a good person.
I agree. I think it's important to be kind, respectful, and supportive of everyone.
I agree. I think it's important to make the world a better place.
I agree. I think it's important to be a positive force in the world.
I agree. I think it's important to make a difference.
I agree. I think it's important to leave the world a better place than we found it.
I agree. I think it's important to make the world a better place for everyone.
I agree. I think it's important to be a force for good in the world.
I agree. I think it's important to make a difference in the world.
I agree. I think it's important to leave the world a better place than we found it.
